title: Thomson Reuters Eikon
summary: The most comprehensive and intuitive set of financial tools available!
description: Thomson Reuters Eikon with Messenger – the most comprehensive, intuitive, and collaborative set of financial tools available! Discover the exceptional clarity and power of Thomson Reuters Eikon with Messenger for Android today.* Note, a Thomson Reuters Eikon with Messenger account is required to access premium features.Features:• Unrivaled market-moving news• Quick and seamless list & portfolio monitoring • Comprehensive market summaries• Around-the-clock real-time data and quotes• Detailed company information — including news, research, top investors, and estimates• Natural language search with Eikon Answers• Alerts and push notifications for news, market data, and research• Real-time research from award-winning analysts around the globe• Ability to save news and research for availability in offline mode• Simultaneous access to desktop and mobile• Support for your Android wearable• Eikon Messenger• League Tables
descriptionHTML:
Thomson Reuters Eikon with Messenger – the most comprehensive, intuitive, and collaborative set of financial tools available! Discover the exceptional clarity and power of Thomson Reuters Eikon with Messenger for Android today.

* Note, a Thomson Reuters Eikon with Messenger account is required to access premium features.

Features:
• Unrivaled market-moving news
• Quick and seamless list & portfolio monitoring
• Comprehensive market summaries
• Around-the-clock real-time data and quotes
• Detailed company information — including news, research, top investors, and estimates
• Natural language search with Eikon Answers
• Alerts and push notifications for news, market data, and research
• Real-time research from award-winning analysts around the globe
• Ability to save news and research for availability in offline mode
• Simultaneous access to desktop and mobile
• Support for your Android wearable
• Eikon Messenger
• League Tables
comments: I'm a registered free user. News section of the app, keeps saying verify your connection. It's buggy connecting. Is news not available to non paid users anymore?
Can't open the news....it just says please verify your connection. very funny....bloomberg much better
Cannot open any alerts as the app crashes as soon as I click on an alert in my feed
It is perfect. except for the fact that both the mobile and desktop messenger can't be active at the same time...
Awsome application . Using this application from long back and now I am use too of this application.  Thanks reuters for this brilliant app.
recentChanges: - Ability to select a News source and access to Saved Searches in News Search
- New Research Document Viewer with ratings support
- New setting to hide messenger conversation history
- Join a new Bilateral chat session from Mobile
